mapper.insert: insert into advertisement (adxname1, adxurl1, adxname2, adxurl2, adxname3, adxurl3, regdate) values (#{adxname1}, #{adxurl1}, #{adxname2}, #{adxurl2}, #{adxname3}, #{adxurl3}, date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d'))
mapper.select: select * from advertisement where adxseq = (select max(adxseq) from advertisement)
